params.taskDescription:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>F</mi>
  <mi>V</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">FV</annotation></semantics></math> = $25,000, <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>t</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">t</annotation></semantics></math> = 10 years, annual simple interest rate of 7.5%
params.detailedSolution: $14,285.72. $14,285.72 needs to be invested so that, after 10 years at 7.5% interest, the investment will be worth $25,000.
